website_summaries.verdict: An excellent formula that provides intense moisture and diminishes brassiness.
pros: It's vegan, cruelty-free, absent of parabens, and sold in recyclable containers
It's expensive, but the formula works wonders
cons: Both the shampoo and the conditioner cost a pretty penny, so it's an investment, and some people complain of purple stains in the tub

customer_reviews.title: THICK PURPLE EVERYWHERE 😨
customer_reviews.text: I have had this shampoo 3 days. I have used it and like it ok despite its price BUT I have this dark purple all over my bathroom. I MAY have a defective tube, I dont know but for such a small squeeze hole under the cap...this stuff is out of control. I set it cap down, it leaks everywhere. So I lean it up cap up again today EVERYWHERE! Its like its alive!! For a 6oz bottle and one use there cant be much left in the tube because I have scrubbed purple for 2 day!!!!!! HELP !! I SURE HAVEN'T GOTTEN ALMOST 30.00 OUT OF THIS. Anyone else have this problem or is my tube a total defect?
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda G Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purple shampoo! It’s smells good, it’s not harsh on my hair infact, it’s pretty gentle(I use it multiple times a week), keeps my blonde from getting Brassy. product_meta.title: The Beachwaver Co. Brb Blonde Purple Shampoo, 6 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
BRB! Your blonde will Be Right Back with our intensely moisturizing Purple Shampoo that eliminates brassy tones and brightens blondes. Aroma Experience: Brazilian Berry. Our Hydro + Ionic Alpha Bond Multiplier™ is an innovative formula which strengthens internal hair structure up to 3x that of untreated hair. Evolving from glucose based chemistry, our HIx penetrates deep into the cortex to create new hydrogen and ionic bonds. Supporting the damaged internal keratin structure, this strengthens and provides manageability, shine, and health back to the hair.

Professional Hairstyling Tools Company by The Beachwaver Co.
